layout.singingstanza: Love suf -- fers long. Love is kind; it is not jeal -- ous. Love does not brag and is not puffed up. Love suf -- fers long. Love is kind; it is not jeal -- ous. Love does not brag and is not puffed up. It does not be -- have un -- be -- com -- ing -- ly; It does not seek its own things; It is not pro -- voked and does not take ac -- count of e -- vil; It does not re -- joice be -- cause of un -- righ -- teous -- ness, But re -- joic -- es with the truth. It cov -- ers all things, be -- lieves all things, Hopes all things, en -- dures all things. Love nev -- er falls a -- way, Love nev -- er falls a -- way, Love nev -- er falls a -- way, Love nev -- er falls a -- way.

lyrics.stanza: Love suffers long. Love is kind; it is not jealous. Love does not brag and is not puffed up. Love suffers long. Love is kind; it is not jealous. Love does not brag and is not puffed up.
It covers all things, believes all things, Hopes all things, endures all things. Love never falls away, Love never falls away, Love never falls away, Love never falls away.
